Show the world your best face by investing in the website your business deserves.

For your convenience, I'm offering my best services as fixed-price packages. If you don't find the service package to meet your needs below, please don't hesitate to get in touch with me for a free consultation.

Whatever help you need, my priority is understanding your business and your customers so I can deliver the most effective solution. I also make it a priority to be available to provide guidance, not just during, but after our engagement, because your success is my success.

Digital Marketing Packages

Connect your website, enhance your brand, and reach more customers.

Strategy Session

฿5,000

Having a great website is only the first step. To succeed online, you also need to have a strategy for how to expand your reach, whether that's through content marketing, social media marketing, or advertising.

At the end of this strategy session (up to three hours), you will have a concrete plan and clear next steps for how to bring more visitors to your website and convert that traffic into better business.

Local Search Set-Up

฿2,500

Google, Trip Advisor, and many other directory services provide free tools to feature your business in front of a larger audience. Are you making the most of this exposure?

Let me help you claim or optimize your listings to ensure that you're presenting your best face to the world and providing the right information to get more customers through your front door.

• Includes free consultation to determine the best channels for your business, and training in any essential tools.
• Photography services can be included for an additional fee.
• Price is per channel.

Social Media Set-Up

฿2,500

Social media influences how customers perceive your brand and ultimately impacts their decision making. Are you making the right impression?

Let me help you set up or optimize your social media profile to ensure you're representing the best aspects of your brand and engaging with your customers.

• Includes free consultation to determine the best channels for your business, training in any essential tools, and five posts to get you started on the right foot.
• Photography services can be included for an additional fee.
• Price is per channel.

Social Media Content Calendar

฿10,000

Regularly creating or sharing content on social media is critical in order to engage with your customers and to amplify your voice. It's also incredibly time-consuming when you're busy running a business.

Let me help you by crafting social media posts that share your unique voice and encourage customers to engage with your profile.

• Scheduling and analytics services can be included for an additional fee.
• Does not include social media management.
• Price is per channel per month.

Email Marketing

฿10,000

Email may not be as sexy as social, but it's still a great tool. Whether you need to share transactional information, educate your audience, or promote your services, email can be a powerful solution.

I can help you put together an email campaign with up to five emails expertly crafted to inform and engage, which can also be built upon or reused for future campaigns

• Includes template design and setting up a free email marketing app if you do not already use one.
• Price is per campaign.

Blogging

฿20,000

Content is king, and there's no better way to drive traffic, boost SEO, and get better leads than by writing about what's important to your customers.

Let me help you reach more customers by creating informative and engaging blog posts with a focus on evergreen content that will continue to draw visitors to your site long after our project is complete.

• Includes up to five blog posts, and promotion on up to three social media channels of your choice for each post.
• Photography services can be included for an additional fee.
• Price is per month.

Full Foundation Suite

Need help with all of the above? Save on à la carte pricing and hire me to build out the essential foundation for your digital growth over the course of three to four months.

A quote can be provided following an initial consultation.

Business Consulting Packages

Digitize your business. Save time and money, and make your customers happy.

Digitize Your Office

Office a mess? Never able to find anything? Does it take ages to respond to simple requests for information?

Make the answers more accessible and searchable by going paperless and digitizing your office. Streamline your processes and automate your business to save time and money, and also serve your customers better.

During this engagement, I will conduct a thorough audit of your back-of-house processes and advise you on the best software and tools to reach your organizational goals. I will also be there every step of the way to help you implement your new processes and to train you and your team.

Improve Your Knowledge Management

The backbone of any service business is its people. When you take a day off, or when your best employees leave, your productivity slows down and bottlenecks occur.

Make your team more efficient, improve collaboration, and get new team members on board faster by capturing and sharing knowledge within your organization.

During this engagement, I will help you to plan and create an internal knowledge base which will be a repository for your important policies and processes, get you set up on Slack, a workplace chat app, and train your team in how to maximize the benefits of both systems.

Set Up a CRM System

Having trouble figuring out who your market is? Struggling to get repeat business? Not sure who your best customers even are?

Successfully managing customer relationships requires knowing all of the important details which lead to their happiness and success, and software can give you a helping hand. Capturing customer data and connecting that to your software and processes helps you to deliver a better customer experience and boost your bottom line.

During this engagement, I will help you to choose the best customer relationship management (CRM) app to meet your budget and needs, and assist in the technical set-up. I will also coach you on how to efficiently enter existing and new customer data, and strategize with you to discover the best way to turn your new capabilities into customer happiness.

Create a Customer Help Center

Do you have a technical product or service with a lot of tricky details and configurable components? Does your team find themselves being asked the exact same questions over and over again, and feel like they're stuck on a loop?

Help your customers to help themselves and improve both customer and employee satisfaction. By investing in a well thought out self-help resource you show potential customers you're committed to their satisfaction, help new customers to succeed, and also help your support staff stay on the same page and work efficiently.

During this engagement, I will help you to set up a self-help center, and also train your team in how to manage and keep it up to date. I can also help you to link this resource to your live chat or help desk apps, and get you set up on both of these if required.

Create a Sales & Marketing Pipeline

Not sure how you're finding new customers? Prospects not following through as expected? Can't keep track of who to call back or which contracts still need to be signed?

Tools exist to track your customers through every stage of their purchasing cycle and to help you and your team capitalize on the moments that matter most when closing the sale.

During this engagement, we'll map out all the touch points of your sales and marketing process to discover where customers may be falling through the cracks and streamline your process to ensure your sales and marketing engine is running smoothly and efficiently.

Map Your Customer Experience

Sales team having trouble closing? Or maybe it's the customer service team who keeps running into the same problems with new customers, or the tech team who don't understand why no one is engaging with the new feature they've been working so hard on.

Whatever problem you're having, creating a customer journey map can be a powerful tool for insight. More than just a handy visual reference, it's a deep dive into the inner workings of your business, and what parts are, or are not serving your customers and your team. Clearly understanding the interactions and touch points which contribute to success or failure are critical if your business is going to continue to improve.

During this series of workshops, we'll define your customer personas to get into the mind of who your business serves and map every stage of their journey in order to troubleshoot your customer experience.

Have a different back-of-house problem not solved by one of the packages above? Let's work together to come up with a solution.

Let's create something together.
